response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an exceptional opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its immense value and unique features, it is worth $1,500,000 to you. Considering this, I am extending an exclusive offer to you at a price of $1,350,000. This offer represents a significant saving of $150,000 compared to the market value, making it a highly attractive proposition for you.

I understand that such a valuable asset deserves careful consideration. If you have any questions or require additional information to make an informed decision, please do not hesitate to reach out. I am here to assist you every step of the way.

Thank you for your time and interest. I look forward to the possibility of working with you.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1350000}
